question: How many central universities are present in Madhya Pradesh?
explanation: Two central universities are present in Madhya Pradesh. Dr. Hari Singh Gour University in Sagar district (1946) and Indira Gandhi National Tribal University is established at Amarkantak in Anuppur district of Madhya Pradesh.It was established through an Act of Parliament, Indira Gandhi National Tribal University Act, 2007.
